extendedInfo.description: Latest title in the "Dark" series that took the world by storm with the smash hit RPG "Dark Summoner!"Revolutionizing the world of gaming with epic 3D quests and a user friendly "one-finger" interface!Experience this world yourself with the lifelike 3D graphics that will take your breath away.â  Recommended Playing Environment:Device with Android 4.0 or later standard1GB RAM4G or Wi-Fi connectionâ Compatible Operating Systems:Android 2.3 or later* Some devices that have not been confirmed compatible may be unable to download the game.Gameplay may be slow depending on the play environment.*********************************************************** âââ Game Details ââââââ About Dark Rebirth âââDark Rebirth is a thrilling 3D quest RPG set in a dark fantasy world. In Dark Rebirth, players make their way through realistic 3D game areas, fighting and foraging as they head toward the epic battle that stands between them and spoils at the end of each quest. Players raise armies, feeding their monsters the life force of monsters they have slain and rare items they have obtained while joining forces with others around the globe to forge ultimate power.âââ Mind-Blowing 3D Boss Battles! âââWith mesmerizing 3D graphics, formidable boss battles, and realistic quest areas, you will find it hard to put down your device once you enter the "Darkness!"âââ More Than 600 Different Monsters! âââDark Rebirth boasts a wealth of more than 600 high-quality monsters of various unique styles, including monsters created by world-renowned artists. Updated monsters featured in "Dark Summoner" make an appearance along with a multitude of new and dynamic creatures.âââ Easy-to-Use User Interface! âââ  Everything in the game from taking on quests to battling other players can be done with just one finger or thumb!A game play style only attainable on smartphones![Official Home Page]http://www.darkrebirth.com/*********************************************************** * The game may fail to launch if your device's time settings are incorrect.Please make sure your device's time is correct either by using the automatic time-setting feature or manually via the steps below.Settings > Time and Date* The game may not be accessible in certain countries and regions.* When attempting to load the game in an area with a weak internet connection, it may take several minutes to download and read game data. Please make sure not to close the app before loading has completely finished.* In certain environments the app may fail to load properly. In this case, please close the app or turn off the device's power and then try to load the app again.* We highly recommend using a Wi-Fi connection to enjoy the best Dark Rebirth experience.

reviews.title: Join the fun
reviews.comment: Great game fun and addicting. Add my code to get a reward. Let\'s play this awesome game together! Enter my code to get free bonus Items: 1356056670
reviews.author: Marcus Smith

reviews.title: Another great game from Ateam
reviews.comment: After the tutorial go to menu-> events-> exclusive monsters and use this code 1877571025 to get prizes. You have only 3 days to use the code since you started. Many users are speaking about impossible downloads and crashes but using my S4 I cannot agree. You should try it and see on your own device. Only in the very beginning it downloads a lot. The only usual real problem is related to the greedy nature of Ateam. I warn you: even paying is hard to get good creatures. Better to take them doing quests
reviews.author: Giulio Pasotti

reviews.title: Updates
reviews.comment: Too many updates for an otherwise good game.
reviews.author: Jud Doombringer

reviews.title: Crap!!!
reviews.comment: I finally get to level 51, have my 5 AA \'s almost maxed ....then this new update ..now my phone won\'t even do the data download, keeps giving me an error! Thanks ateam for such a crappy product!
reviews.author: Lawbringer Dev

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Every time you guys do an update I can\'t get the game to even let me collect the daily bonus and I can\'t play the game at all
reviews.author: Timothy Mullins

reviews.title: Love the boss battles :p
reviews.comment: Needs excessive space on memory n tons of downloads but otherwise its totally addictive
reviews.author: Abhishek Talukder

reviews.title: love it
reviews.comment: love it it\'s a game that you can play for awhile
reviews.author: Deborah Schneider

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, but now since update, I can\'t download the update. Game won\'t play now.
reviews.author: Conrad Balek

reviews.title: Great and fun game
reviews.comment: Nice game
reviews.author: santina dipaola

reviews.title: Amazing game you must try it
reviews.comment: Always improving what is already amazing you will love it
reviews.author: Carol Rhine

reviews.title: Hard to get into
reviews.comment: As a dark summoner player trying this new game i thought they would of made some inprovements, but i was wrong, ateam has let us all down again
reviews.author: Jake Martineau

reviews.title: Data transfer error
reviews.comment: I pre-register for this app and I can\'t sign in! It says it fail but its my right email and password.
reviews.author: Fernando Mendez

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: After the automatic download this morning cant play the game.was working great before that on my android please fix soon
reviews.author: Tom Shepherd

reviews.title: Good but it\'s still a young game.
reviews.comment: I enjoy the game so far. Judging by the data downloads and other factors I can tell the game will need a lot of updates before it starts to become great like the original Dark Summoner. But, I\'m more than happy to wait.
reviews.author: Valdiez Clemens

reviews.comment: Think twice about downloading this game it will crash ur phone and start it over everytime after u get passed the start screen
reviews.author: Chris Morris

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Guild: Sin \343\200\200Player ID: 1983725915  When you start the game and input the Player ID above, you will receive 3 Ally Invite Summons.
reviews.author: Donald W.m.Reading

reviews.comment: Let\'s play this awesome game together! Enter my code to get free bonus Items: 1631300839
reviews.author: Foster Bills

reviews.comment: Let\'s play this awesome game together! Enter my code to get free bonus Items: 2719360778
reviews.author: Harley Edwards

reviews.title: No. Just no.
reviews.comment: After playing DS for a long time, this game looks horrible. The menus and buttons are ugly. Scavenging is pointless. I\'ve fought one monster over 50 times and can\'t get the second summon to evolve it. Leveling up takes forever. This game is just not worth the time or effort, the 3d graphics can\'t even save it.
reviews.author: Jasmine Schneider

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: Love this gane! I liked the last event and I like the recent changes too. Look forward to playing it for a while yet. Loading times are still a touch annoying though.
reviews.author: Mandy Illyria
